name: Model.CONNECT
short_description: A model integration and co-simulation platform connecting virtual and real components

name: FMI Bench
short_description: Flexible FMI integration and customization workbench

name: easySSP
short_description: Cloud based SSP editor in a lightweight and innovative design, easy to use and expandable with powerful pro and customer specific features

name: Simcenter System Architect (since release 2021.1)
short_description: Simcenter System Architect is a platform to support the process of architecture driven development of simulation models via model integration with execution/cosimulation capabilities

name: Simcenter Studio (since release 2021.2)
short_description: Simcenter Studio is an application for generating and evaluating system architectures during the early concept phase

name: Dymola
short_description: Dymola is a model development and simulation tool for Modelica and FMI.
